ratinfestation.name: Generic Task 1
ratinfestation.description: Bulk Bogan needs you to defeat 20 rats!
dialogueHidden: Please help me with these rats!
If you slay 20 of them, I'll su-
dialogueStarted: Please, those rats are really annoying!

examiner10.name: Examiner
examiner10.description: Inspect 10 random things around the world.

boxingman.name: Generic Task 2
boxingman.description: Talk to Mike Tyson in Mudwich about beating stuff up
dialogueHidden: Hey there, you look like you can take a punch!
I'm looking for someone to beat up some stuff for me.
If you go and beat up 25 snakes, I have a special reward for you!
dialogueStarted: I'll show you something special if you do!

ahiddenpath.name: Hidden Path
ahiddenpath.description: Discover the hidden path in Mudwich.

hiddenreward.name: Hidden Reward
hiddenreward.description: Kill some secret spooky skeletons somewhere.

wormholes.name: Wormholes
wormholes.description: Investigate the spooky occurrence in Mudwich.

ancientwizard.name: Ancient Wizard
ancientwizard.description: Defeat the ancient wizard in Mudwich!

crabproblem.name: Crab Problem
dialogueHidden: Listen, could you lend me a hand?
I see you're pretty good with the killing stuff.
dialogueStarted: C'mon man, please kill me 10 crabs.

warriorcrab.name: Warrior Crab
warriorcrab.description: Defeat the Hermit Crab Warrior hidden on the beach.

sandtreasure.name: Sand Treasure
sandtreasure.description: Find the treasure hidden somewhere on the beach.

mermaidguard.name: Mermaid Guard
mermaidguard.description: Defeat the mermaid guarding the Sea Cucumber!

pirates.name: Pirates
pirates.description: There's skeleton pirates under the sea?

piratestreasure.name: Pirate's Treasure
piratestreasure.description: Find the treasure hidden in the pirate's ship.

zombielovers.name: Zombie Lovers
zombielovers.description: The worried zombie girlfriend needs your help!
dialogueHidden: You! Please, you need to help me!
My boyfriend went down in that mine below and got stuck!
He looks just like one of those zombies!
Slay 20 of them just to make sure they're not my boyfriend.
What? I gotta give you a task, isn't that why you talked to me?

babyseadragon.name: Baby Sea Dragon
babyseadragon.description: Defeat the baby sea dragon guardian!

pathofdeath.name: Path of Death
pathofdeath.description: Defeat the ogre defending the ogre lord.

treadcarefully.name: Tread Carefully
treadcarefully.description: I literally said to tread carefully.

webdeveloper.name: Web Developer
webdeveloper.description: Spiders are developing webs left and right!

ogresgateway.name: Ogre's Gateway
ogresgateway.description: Discover the secret portal after defeating ogres.

frozentundra.name: Frozen Tundra
frozentundra.description: Gain access to icelands by defeating the guardians.

iceworld.name: Ice World
iceworld.description: Gain access into the ice world!

forestdragon.name: Forest Dragon
forestdragon.description: Defeat the dragon laying dormant under Mudwich.

roadtohell.name: Road to Hell
roadtohell.description: Defeat the Dark Wolf guarding the entrance to the Hellhound.

hellhound.name: Hellhound
hellhound.description: Defeat the hellhound in the hell dungeon!

miniemperor.name: Mini Emperor
miniemperor.description: Defeat the mini emperor in the mini knight's land!

examiner25.name: Examiner
examiner25.description: Inspect 25 random things around the world.

examiner50.name: Examiner
examiner50.description: Inspect 50 random things around the world.

gravemystery.name: Grave Mystery
gravemystery.description: Discovered a cryptic set of gravestones.

kaetramdungeon.name: Kaetram's Dungeon
kaetramdungeon.description: Discovered the secret ladder to enter Kaetram's dungeon!
